Sudoku Solver

Solving SUDOKUs using boolean satisfiability.

Download Download View Sudoku Solver on GitHub

Sudoku Solver

Recently, I have been having fun using SAT solvers for a variety of tasks. This time I thought I would model sudoku problems as a boolean satisfiability problem. I'm surprised it works so good. I tried it on the problem that comes up on googling hardest sudoku problem ever. It solved it within miniseconds and without a hiccup.

Credit: Picosat has been used for solving SAT equations in this program.

Test to see if pure html works
